text: but you are morally wrong and everyone knows it
Read the court's decision and see who's morally right
that you could legally do what you are doing
and turning trust into financial goodwill over the long term
that Metway in its previous financial life had contributed seventeen million to the Contingency Fund
because it had changed its name as a bank
but all members do not suffer equally in fact most benefit
when they compare me with you
and hard as the law allows
hand you twenty three million dollars
